about_the_game:
This is the official soundtrack from Usurper - the Metroidvania style Action-RPG with a Lovecraftian theme. This soundtrack DLC contains all of the original instrumental music composed and produced by Jamie Warne (Studio Jamming), plus includes 3 previously unheard bonus tracks as a thank you for buying the soundtrack!

Total length of the soundtrack is 3h:24m:40s. All music is in MP3 format.

Track List:
  • 1 - Lost Traveller [02:48]
  • 2 - Alfred Veimar Waltham [03:47]
  • 3 - Conspiracy [05:36]
  • 4 - Town of Hazuth [06:38]
  • 5 - Library of Emil [06:00]
  • 6 - The Bridge [02:54]
  • 7 - Falsehood [06:00]
  • 8 - The Rot [04:30]
  • 9 - Coolant [06:18]
  • 10 - Awaiting Execution [05:31]
  • 11 - Vitae [05:20]
  • 12 - Depths of Misery [05:01]
  • 13 - Protein [04:54]
  • 14 - Dhaos [05:18]
  • 15 - Guidance [04:17]
  • 16 - Derelict [06:16]
  • 17 - Collective Force [04:52]
  • 18 - City of Higher Life [05:14]
  • 19 - Streets of London [05:12]
  • 20 - The Spread [04:28]
  • 21 - Shady Scaffolding [04:25]
  • 22 - Circus of Blood [04:43]
  • 23 - Dead God [05:43]
  • 24 - Lungs of the Beast [02:17]
  • 25 - Promised Land [03:19]
  • 26 - His Residence [05:52]
  • 27 - Eraen [Stage 1] [04:12]
  • 28 - Eraen [Stage 2] [04:12]
  • 29 - Angel of Seraph [04:36]
  • 30 - The Torturer [04:18]
  • 31 - Veimar [04:09]
  • 32 - Meat of the Citadel [04:02]
  • 33 - The Sniper [04:19]
  • 34 - The Fog Eater [04:10]
  • 35 - AI Core [04:54]
  • 36 - The Shoggoth [04:07]
  • 37 - The Navigator [Stage 1] [05:31]
  • 38 - The Navigator [Stage 2] [05:07]
  • 39 - The Navigator [Stage 3] [04:17]
  • 40 - Trailer 1 [01:54]
  • 41 - Trailer 2 [01:16]
  • 42 - Vast Emptiness [05:19] (Bonus track)
  • 43 - Madness Ensues [05:23] (Bonus track)
  • 44 - The Departing Citadel [05:24] (Bonus track)

Also included is a 350px x 350px album art cover image for you to use in your music player of choice.

Note:
To access the OST once the DLC has been bought, it will automatically be downloaded to the Steam folder on the relevant hard drive, such as;
Program Files (x86) > Steam > steamapps > common > Usurper > OST
(Location may vary depending on where you install Steam)

name: Usurper - Original Soundtrack
short_description: This is the official soundtrack from Usurper - the Metroidvania style Action-RPG with a Lovecraftian theme. This DLC contains all of the original instrumental music composed by Jamie Warne (Studio Jamming), including 3 previously unheard bonus tracks. All music is in MP3 format.
